name: BMONEY WIZE LTD
goal:
We aim to increase the financial and numeracy skills of young people using innovative, engaging, interactive tools and resources in a fun way.

The objective is to equip our target group with the knowledge, confidence and skills to manage money.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Education and training, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Our policies include:
Equality & Diversity
Equality Opportunities
Safeguarding
Health & Safety
